summary:
A world's fair, or expo, is a big global event where countries show off their cool achievements. These fairs happen in different places around the world and last for a few months. They're like a huge international party! The first one was in 1851 in London.

The name "world's fair" is mostly used in the USA, while other countries call it a "universal exhibition." There are different kinds of expos, like World Expos and Specialised Expos. A special group called the Bureau International des Expositions (BIE) makes sure these events are official. Recent expos were in Kazakhstan, Dubai, and Qatar.
title: World's fair
